attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is now official.
Britains jails are full.
I am petitioning to deport any immigrant offenders. They come here, break the law, serve pitiful sentences and then are let go into the community so they can re-offend. SEND THEM HOME NOW!!!! Free prison spaces and show that Britain is not a soft touch.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
